name: Zenith Racing
description:
Zenith Racing is an open world car game designed for car enthusiasts. With a car list unlike many other games, it gives drivers the freedom to drive and explore how they want. 

Updates & Bugs

Zenith Racing will receive updates roughly every month, adding new cars and fixing bugs mentioned by the community. If you discover any bugs, post them on the discussion board or on r/ZenithRacing on Reddit.
